document.full_text: u.s. consumers increased spending for an eighth straight month in february, but much of the gain went to cover rising food and energy costs, providing only a modest lift to the economy.
document.title: consumer spending up, energy prices dent growth
lines_and_colors: u.s. consumers increased spending for an eighth straight month in february, but much of the gain went to cover rising food and energy costs, providing only a modest lift to the economy.
